m_szDocSumamry: Solar Power Funding Healthy in Q2 Despite Industry Turmoil August 22nd, 2012 by Andrew     Total funding in the solar energy sector amounted to more than $4.3 billion spread across 66 transactions in the second quarter of 2012, with strong results in venture capital funding, debt funding, and corporate funding in particular, according to a Mercom Capital Group report.
